item.title: Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Sleek style. Aggressive tone. The Gibson SG Standard is a rock icon known for its devilish looks and powerful sound, favored by players seeking raw energy and playability.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to rock out in style with the Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar. Boasting a sleek, double-cutaway design and iconic sound, the SG Standard is a favorite among guitarists seeking a powerful, no-nonsense instrument. The mahogany body and neck provide a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain, while the slim-tapered neck profile offers fast, comfortable playability. Equipped with a pair of high-output humbucking pickups, the SG Standard delivers thick, crunchy tones with plenty of bite and aggression, making it perfect for everything from classic rock to heavy metal. With its timeless design, legendary tone, and uncompromising quality, the Gibson SG Standard is sure to inspire you to new heights of musical creativity.

  • Body: Mahogany
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fretboard: Rosewood (Dalbergia latifolia)
  • Neck profile: Slim Taper
  • Graphtech nut
  • Nut width: 43 mm
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • 22 Cold-treated medium frets
  • Trapeze fretboard inlays
  • Cream fretboard binding
  • ABR-1 Tuneomatic bridge
  • Pickups: Burstbucker 61R (neck) and 61T (bridge) humbuckers
  • 2 Volume and 2 tone controls
  • Vintage deluxe machine heads
  • Colour: Heritage Cherry
  • Includes case
  • Made in USA

item.title: Gibson Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Timeless tone. Legendary playability. The Gibson Les Paul Standard is a rock icon, delivering powerful sound and unparalleled craftsmanship.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to be mesmerized by the legendary tone and craftsmanship of the Gibson Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar. Boasting a mahogany body topped with a carved maple cap, this iconic instrument delivers a rich, resonant sound with plenty of sustain and warmth. The slim-tapered mahogany neck offers effortless playability, while the rosewood fingerboard provides a smooth and comfortable feel. Equipped with Burstbucker Pro pickups, the Les Paul Standard produces a powerful and articulate sound that cuts through any mix with ease. With its classic looks, timeless tone, and impeccable build quality, the Gibson Les Paul Standard is a true masterpiece that has stood the test of time.

  • Slash signature model
  • Body: Mahogany (Swietenia macrophylla – Origin: India/ Indonesia)
  • Top: AAA flamed maple
  • Neck: Mahogany (Swietenia macrophylla – Origin: India/ Indonesia)
  • Fretboard: Rosewood (Dalbergia Latifolia)
  • Neck profile: Thick
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • Nut width: 43 mm
  • Tektoid nut
  • 22 Frets
  • Pickups: 2x Custom Burstbucker Alnico II double black
  • ABR bridge
  • Aluminium stop bar
  • Colour: November Burst
  • Case, accessory kit and Slash picks set included
  • Made in USA
